Gerald Goldenberg

  1. Foster Name: Gerald Edward
  2. Foster Family: James and Mary Curren
  3. Location of Family: Greeley, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Greeley, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 3
  7. Date of Birth: 1909-04-02
  8. Date of Death: 1984-07-27
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), n.p.; National Orphan Train Complex.
